item.title: By: Antonio
item.dc:creator: Antonio
item.description:
Dear mr. Steave,
My name is Antonio, I'm from Genoa North Italy, Congratulations I follow many of his works.
Escuse me but I'm trying this place because the other (contact me) does not accept my email.
Your project of glcd scope is very nice. I made the oscilloscope and I used a PIC18f4550 instead of a PI18F2550 I try to load this file .hex http://semifluid.com/wp-content/uplo...bootloader.hex generated by this CCS code http://semifluid.com/wp-content/uplo...o-bootloader.c of your web site.
I don't understand...... Show only the positive part of a sine wave and it is positioned at the bottom. The frequency and the line of zero-crossing dont'works.
Can you send me a other .hex
Tanks
bye Antonio
item.content:encoded:
Dear mr. Steave,

My name is Antonio,
I’m from Genoa North Italy,
Congratulations I follow many of his works.

Escuse me but I’m trying this place because the other (contact me) does not accept my email.

Your project of glcd scope is very nice.
I made the oscilloscope and
I used a PIC18f4550 instead of a PI18F2550
I try to load this file .hex
http://semifluid.com/wp-content/uplo…bootloader.hex
generated by this CCS code
http://semifluid.com/wp-content/uplo…o-bootloader.c of your web site.

I don’t understand……
Show only the positive part of a sine wave and it is positioned at the bottom.
The frequency and the line of zero-crossing dont’works.

Can you send me a other .hex

Tanks

bye
Antonio
